statements: SELECT * FROM follow_up_emails;
SELECT email_id, email_subject, feedback_score FROM follow_up_emails;
SELECT customer_id, feedback_score, sent_date FROM follow_up_emails WHERE feedback_score > 3;
SELECT * FROM follow_up_emails ORDER BY sent_date DESC;
SELECT email_id, customer_id, email_subject FROM follow_up_emails WHERE sent_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY sent_date ASC;
SELECT email_id, customer_id, feedback_score, email_subject, sent_date FROM follow_up_emails WHERE customer_id = '12345678-1234-1234-1234-123456789abc';
SELECT email_subject, feedback_score FROM follow_up_emails WHERE feedback_score > 3 ORDER BY sent_date DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_emails FROM follow_up_emails;
SELECT email_id, customer_id FROM follow_up_emails WHERE feedback_score < 2 AND email_subject LIKE '%important%' ORDER BY sent_date ASC;
SELECT AVG(feedback_score) AS average_score, MAX(feedback_score) AS max_score FROM follow_up_emails WHERE sent_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT feedback_id, satisfaction_score FROM survey_feedback WHERE satisfaction_score > 4;
SELECT customer_id, feedback_text FROM survey_feedback WHERE feedback_text IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM customers c JOIN survey_feedback sf ON c.customer_id = sf.customer_id;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers;
SELECT * FROM survey_feedback WHERE satisfaction_score > 4 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT customer_id, feedback_text FROM survey_feedback WHERE customer_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM customers JOIN survey_feedback ON customers.customer_id = survey_feedback.customer_id;

SELECT customer_name, satisfaction_score, feedback_text FROM customers JOIN survey_feedback ON customers.customer_id = survey_feedback.customer_id WHERE satisfaction_score < 3 ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM survey_feedback WHERE satisfaction_score > 3;
SELECT feedback_text FROM survey_feedback WHERE feedback_id = 5;
SELECT email_subject, email_body FROM follow_up_emails WHERE sent_date = '2022-01-01';
SELECT customer_id, satisfaction_score FROM survey_feedback ORDER BY satisfaction_score DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_id, satisfaction_score FROM survey_feedback WHERE satisfaction_score > 3 ORDER BY satisfaction_score ASC;
SELECT * FROM follow_up_emails WHERE sent_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT customer_name, email_subject FROM customers INNER JOIN follow_up_emails ON customers.customer_id = follow_up_emails.customer_id;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, email_address FROM customers WHERE survey_feedback > 4;
SELECT * FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT customer_name, email_address FROM customers WHERE survey_feedback < 2.5;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, email_address FROM customers WHERE survey_feedback IS NULL;
SELECT * FROM customers ORDER BY customer_id DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT customer_name, email_address FROM customers WHERE survey_feedback > 4.5
SELECT DISTINCT customer_name FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name ASC
SELECT customer_name, survey_feedback FROM customers WHERE survey_feedback >= 3.0 ORDER BY survey_feedback DESC
SELECT customer_name, survey_feedback FROM customers WHERE email_address LIKE 'john%'
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM customers;
SELECT * FROM surveys WHERE customer_id = 10;
SELECT template_name, email_subject FROM email_templates ORDER BY template_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM email_logs WHERE send_date <= '2022-01-01';
SELECT customer_id, scheduled_date FROM scheduled_emails WHERE customer_id = 20;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT email_subject, email_body FROM email_templates ORDER BY template_name DESC;
SELECT c.first_name, c.last_name, e.email_body FROM customers c JOIN email_templates e ON c.customer_id = e.template_id;
SELECT s.survey_date, c.first_name, c.last_name, s.survey_response FROM surveys s JOIN customers c ON s.customer_id = c.customer_id WHERE s.survey_date >= '2022-01-01';
